org.dgfoundation.amp.ar

Class ReportGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.ReportGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmpReportGenerator

    public abstract class ReportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    Jun 23, 2006 The report generator class. This class gathers data from the db, performs processing and creates the structures that need to be displayed.

        retrieve the categories that will serve to create subsets (subColumnS) of Categorizable CellS
        Parameters:
        columnName - the name of the column, to customize the returned category list in order to suit that particular column
        Returns:
        the list of category names
